SIT’s Public Statement for Cessation of SIT -DigiPen (Singapore) Mechatronics Systems Programme
The Bachelor of Engineering with Honours in Mechatronics Systems , a joint degree programme  currently
offered by SIT and DigiPen Institute of Technology Singapore [DigiPen (Singapore)], will take in its final
cohort of students in AY2024. SIT and DigiPen (Singapore) have decided to cease the joint degree programme as part of the regular review p rocess.
This cessation will not affect current students or alumni. SIT and DigiPen (Singapore)  are committed
to ensuring that the quality of teaching remains of a high standard until the final batch of students graduate
in 2028. The joint degree will c ontinue to be recognised in Singapore and beyond.
